a.style: font-family:"Playfair Display", Georgia, "Times New Roman", serif

text.tspan: Average working hours per worker over a full year. Before 1950 the data corresponds only to full-time production
workers (non-agricultural activities). Starting 1950 estimates cover total hours worked in the economy as measured
Note: We plot the data from Huberman & Minns (2007) and extend coverage using an updated vintage of PWT, which uses the same underlying
source. Comparisons between countries are limited due to differences in measurement.
